revision.comment: /* top */clean up, replaced: hynix → SK hynix, SK SK hynix → SK hynix
revision.text:

|brand = Banana Pi |model = BPI P2 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = Zero |revision = v1.1 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 11/13/2023 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.wi-cat.ru/Banana_Pi_BPI_P2_Zero_(V1.1) |wlclass = N150 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = single-board computer |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Allwinner;H3;H.265/HEVC; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A7 |cpu1spd = 1.0 GHz <!-- ARM --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Samsung;KLM8G1GETF-B041; |flash1size = 8 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR3 |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 512 |ram1chip = SK hynix;H5TQ4G63EFR-RDC; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;;; |stockos = Linux;;;
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0 (OTG) |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 1 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_poe_type = af |pwr_poe = <!-- POE Volts --> |pwr_poe_amp = <!-- POE Amps --> |pwr_conn = USB (Micro-B) Female
|serial = yes,, 3-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1) |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Micro SD Card slot, Bluetooth 4.2 BLE, Mini HDMI 1.4, MIPI CSI, GPIO |addchip = 1A, 1.5MHz Synchronous Step-Down Regulator;Silergy;SY8008B;;2;,,, 2A, 1MHz Synchronous Step-Down Regulator; Silergy;SY8089;;1;,,, 3A, 500KHz Synchronous Step Down Regulator;Silergy;SY8113B;;1;,,, Microprocessor Supervisory Circuit;SGMicro;SGM803;;1;,,, 300mA CMOS LDO Regulator;Diodes Inc;AP2127;;2;,,, Ultra Low Capacitance TVS Array;SemTech;RClamp0524P;;3; |802dot11_protocols = bgn
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = Armbian (unofficial)
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = 32 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B0B9RLGH3Z |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = KeiIoT K016-CW43-SW |rad1modif = SDIO 2.0 |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Cypress;CYW43438;CYW43438K; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 1 |rad1rxchains = 1 |rad1sstreams = 1 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 150 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 |rad1correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad1cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ===Specifications=== :'''Banana Pi BPI-P2 Zero''' board *CPU: [[Allwinner]] H3 @1.0GHz (H.265/HEVC) :SoC: Quad-core ARM (Cortex-A7) :GPU: ''Mali-400 MP2'' @600MHz, OpenGL ES 2.0 *Memory: 512MB (DDR3) RAM (shared with GPU) *Wi-Fi: '''[[KeiIoT]]''' [http://www.keiiot.com/en/product-73402-168733.html K016-CW43-SW], 802.11bgn, BT 4.2 <!-- * KeiIoT K016-CW43-SW • Cypress CYW43438K - 1T1R 802.11bgn, 2.4GHz WLAN, Wi-Fi (SDIO 2.0), BT 4.2 （UART/PCM) :K019-CW43-DW • Cypress CYW43455 - FCC ID: S4LFF50, 1T1R 802.11abgn/ac, 2.4GHz/5GHz WLAN, Wi-Fi (SDIO 2.0/3.0), BT 5.1 (UART/PCM) --> *Network: 1x FE port w/ optional 802.3af PoE *GPIO: 1x 40-pin connector *Power Source: 5V/2A via Micro USB :or 802.3af PoE (optional)
==Links of Interest== *[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Banana_Pi#Banana_Pi_BPI-P2_Zero ''Banana Pi BPI-P2 Zero'' on '''Wikipedia'''] *[http://wiki.banana-pi.org/Banana_Pi_BPI-P2_Zero ''Banana Pi BPI-P2 Zero'' on '''Banana Pi''' Wiki] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2018/08/02/banana-pi-bpi-p2-zero-board-poe-camera-allwinner-h2/ ''Banana Pi BPI-P2 Zero Board'' on '''CNX|Software'''] *[https://linuxgizmos.com/two-new-open-spec-banana-pi-boards-feature-poe/ ''Two new open-spec Banana Pi boards feature PoE'' on '''LinuxGizmos''']
==See also== {{Project:Network/Banana Pi models}}
